alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson Davis and northeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buller, or near Iowa, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Welsh, Iowa, Fenton, Moss Bluff, Pine Island, Buller, Lebleu Settlement, Lacassine, and Roanoke. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 30 and 60. Interstate 210 between mile markers 7 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Calcasieu; Southern Jefferson Davis
